## \_replace() function

Replace an object in an array objects with a new value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _replace<T>(array: Maybe<ImmutableArray<T>>, obj: Immutable<T>, id: unknown, idProp: Prop<Immutable<T>>): Immutable<T>[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | Maybe&lt;ImmutableArray&lt;T&gt;&gt; | An array of objects |
|  obj | Immutable&lt;T&gt; | The new object |
|  id | unknown | A unique value identifying the object being replaced |
|  idProp | Prop&lt;Immutable&lt;T&gt;&gt; | A property on the object that contains the unique value |

<b>Returns:</b>

Immutable&lt;T&gt;\[\]
